title: [@RiotMeddler ] Creating A New Lissandra Passive
body:
http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-bdMbzGJg9Xg/VHWcu64CBlI/AAAAAAAAehQ/wo5e7FEnbEA/s1600/lissandra.jpg

I want everyone to be part of giving ideas to a new passive for Lissandra as you mentioned before **Meddler says " Would still like to find a more satisfying passive for her, want something that creates some interesting decisions though, particularly if its adding significant power. "**

(MEANING NO SHIELD PASSIVE SO COME UP WITH SOMETHING THAT HAS TO DO WITH  POWER) 

My Idea Passive: After casting 4 spells, Lissandra's next spell will open a hidden passive for one of her skills. 
(Her helmet will light up in a certain color to notify the enemy that her passive is in place or a mist of coldness surrounds her body )

**Q:**  *Hidden Passive* The shard that passes through a target has an Increase  width
**W:** *Hidden Passive*  Inflicts slow movement speed 
**E: ** *Hidden Passive* Cool down is reduced after Glacial path is used 
**R:** *Hidden Passive* Enemies who are in range of Frozen Tomb are stunned for 1.25 Seconds
